label: 日本書紀
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 55th  . Nara National Museum . 2003
説明文: The first of the Six National Histories (Rikkokushi) and Japan's oldest official history in thirty books. Compiled in 720 by Toneri Shinnō on imperial command, it contains myths, legends, and historical records relating to divinities and sovereigns from mythical rulers through the end of the seventh century. Also Nihongi. [六国史、舎人親王、日本紀]
